code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AlertsList(){const[alerts,setAlerts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/api/alerts').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setAlerts(data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold",children:"Alerts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:alerts.map(alert=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"mb-2 border p-2 rounded shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{className:"capitalize",children:[alert.level,":"]})," ",alert.message]},alert.id))})]});}export default AlertsList;
